lang.description: Select the language of form or input the language key of custom languages, default: zh_CN

languages.description: Custom language packages, format refer to the docs.

descriptors.description: FormData's descriptors, which will be used to generate the form.

font-size.description: Font size of form(for compute label's width), default: 14.

bg-color-offset.description: Form background color offset(for distinguish the multi-level form), default 8.

show-outer-error.description: Whether show the error of the parent component, default: true
